website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few design and durability concerns, this model is worth considering if your cat is a "kicker" that sends litter spewing over the sides of typical litter pans.
pros: Owners brag about how well it keeps litter contained, thanks to the high walls and thick rim
Deep interior holds an ample amount of litter, and makes it practical for large or multiple cats
Easy to scoop around the simple, rectangular interior
cons: The bag-holding anchor is a nice idea, but doesn't work as well as expected
Plastic is on the thin side and prone to cracking

customer_reviews.title: Great Simple Litter Box!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this litter box for a couple of days now and so far I am very satisfied with this purchase. The sides and back are really high so my kitten can dig to China and there is very little over spillage of litter. I did notice that the bottom of the box looks very flimsy and I am hoping that it doesn't break on me since it suits my kitty's needs perfectly. Will update should it break on me in the next couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: W. Franceschi

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, size, and look of the box, but it cracked after a few weeks of use by a single cat. :(
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Fragile plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Nice design but thin fragile plastic, bottom cracked in a month. The bottom of the litter box doesn't sit directly on the floor, it's raised up a little and you can see where the plastic is sinking, turning white from stress of the weight of the litter and cats using it. I went to empty and clean the box today and it's got a 2 inch crack in the base, I've duck taped it while I look for a higher quality plastic box. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: B. Neilly

customer_reviews.title: Catit Cat litter pan
customer_reviews.text: I have tried almost every litter box on the market. This one is the best hands down! It's reasonably priced and very well made. I have tried the ones that the cat has to jump into from the top to try and control litter spillage. I liked it, but the cat not so much. And I worried she wouldn't use it as she aged. Other boxes seemed to shallow to contain litter. This box has high sides and the rim you attach around the edges keeps the litter where it belongs......in the box. The box has a good size footprint and is the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: TRUMP 2020

customer_reviews.title: I can see how this box could be good for some cats
customer_reviews.text: This did not work well for me. Received it, put litter in it, and my cat went right in it. Problem is he peed on lip where he steps in and it went on floor. First time ever my cat has ever done that. I was hoping to get away from covered cat box because he gets the powder all over him from top of box. But guess he just has to have the covered. I can see how this box could be good for some cats.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L Georgi

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with my purchase and less cleaning of scattered litter
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a few days and the kicked out litter issue has stopped! We have a tall cat that kicked litter out of the box and all over the floor. The sides are tall and the lip in the front is several inches taller than the old litter box. The pan is made of thin plastic that holds up the weight of litter and a large cat. So far, I'm happy with my purchase and less cleaning of scattered litter!
customer_reviews.author: Regis

customer_reviews.title: Large, doesn’t keep liter in
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason, this box seems to be easier to clean, maybe because it’s brand new, but nothing is sticking! That’s a plus. The only downside is that I specifically ordered these because it claimed the rims would hell with liter flying out of the box....and I’ve seen absolutely no difference. For the price, if you just need a new liter box I’d say get it. It’s large and great for multiple cats. I just wouldn’t buy it if your only reason was for the “rim” to keep liter in.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Zaccagnino

customer_reviews.title: Kind of flimsy and brittle
customer_reviews.text: This box is quite large and holds a lot of litter, so I expected it to be made of sturdy plastic, but I am disappointed by its actual construction. It is difficult to move from place to place when full, because it is insufficiently rigid to hold its shape when lifted, and mine actually cracked a bit while being held up with both hands. It still works, and the snap-on rim will probably keep the crack from spreading, but I don't think it should have cracked in the first place. Except for the materials, I like the design, but I wouldn't buy another unless I was sure it was made of sterner stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hussong

customer_reviews.title: Cracked within 6 mos of use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this litter box about 6 mos and while washing it, I just noticed it had a crack that goes from the top to around mid way to the bottom of the box. I do love the size and the rim that helps with tracking but unfortunately I can't recommend it when it's cracked. I was going to buy another one but now I'll search for another more durable one.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great litter pan
customer_reviews.text: This litter pan is a generous size but not overly large. What makes it special is the high back and rim around the edges. My cat is no longer throwing litter all over the floor when she digs. What a major help this is! One little gripe, the tape holding the rim down was really stuck and took some work to get it off. Please consider better packing tape that doesn't go on for life? Overall well worth the money to not sweep litter every day.
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnati Miller

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: VERY DISAPPOINTED IN THIS PRODUCT. IT DOES NOT PREVENT LITTER FROM SPILLING OUT OF THE PAN. LITTER GOES EVERYWHERE! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: For first time I have to leave bad review for Catit items and this breaks my heart
customer_reviews.text: For first time I have to leave bad review for Catit items and this breaks my heart. After recent addition to the household, I decided to add this litter pan to accommodate the extra furbaby. The litter pan arrived in a very large box which allowed it to shake around during shipment i presume, with no padding forthe tray, in which, the tray arrived with a large crack running down the side into the bottom of the tray. Making it pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: Srđana

customer_reviews.title: Great size! Bigger than it looks in advertised photo!
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw the advertised picture on this litter box, I immediately discounted it as too small. It looked little, and my cat is big. There’s just no good reference for scale in that picture, and the rim lip gave me an impression that this was much smaller. Fortunately I stumbled on this item again and noticed reviews that said it was a good size for their big cats. I’m so delighted with this litter box! I got this along with the Litter Champ to replace my automated system. I love both of them so much! My cat has plenty of room to do his business, it’s easy to clean, and there’s no lingering odor. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought this was for the rim cover to protect plastic liner. The cover helped to minimize scratches and punctures, but didn’t totally prevent this damage from stubborn cats. The rim also helps to minimize the amount of excess litter on the floor. Knowing these cats, I think this litter box works better than I could have hoped for and glad I made the purchase. I just double up on liners (jumbo, but might try larger)
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Gets holes in the bottom
customer_reviews.text: At first glance this is a cute litter box. Within a years time, I found that the box did not keep litter in better than my other cat boxes, and then I found a hole in the bottom of the box that I have taped up. Mind you this box had only been in one spot, never moved around. This was a surprise to me, I have bought cat litter boxes over 20 years and have never had a hole develop, I have a box now, that is 10 years older than this one and no hole.
customer_reviews.author: Michlawness

customer_reviews.title: Good sized
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy and are great for my big tom who loves to kick the litter, but doesn't squat like the girls so the higher height on the back and sides is needed! This will hold 15lb of litter if you want that much. I use about 1/2 that...that way the cats have plenty of kicking and hiding of treasures, and I can still scoop it easy.
customer_reviews.author: momcat1

customer_reviews.title: Like the detachable rim so I can clamp down a ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Plenty big for kitty to walk around in, high sides so she doesn't...eh..."think outside the box", if you know what I mean. Bottom seems thick enough, unless your cat weights 200 lbs. and wears spiked heels or cleats. Like the detachable rim so I can clamp down a plastic liner that I cut myself from a bulk roll of plastic sheet that I bought from some website...umm, oh yeah, a place called Amazon.com. Anyway, my cat and me like this litter box, even though only she uses it. My job is to scoop it out, etc. Just like your job is.
customer_reviews.author: Mod_Max

customer_reviews.title: Every cat owner needs this!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats, and we should have named one of them 'China' because that's where she tries to dig to in her litter box. Meanwhile, the litter is flying in every direction. I swear, this cat kicks litter for a solid ten (or more) minutes before she's satisfied with her level of coverage--all over the room. And now? Ta-dah! No more tip-toeing through a minefield of gross cat litter sprinkled all about or sweeping the entire room. I'm the happy owner of two of these. Whoever invented this is brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Dolphin

customer_reviews.title: Love it; cat uses it; I didn't ask her opinion
customer_reviews.text: I generally liked the litter boxes with the lids and opening but my new cat is overweight and I thought that they lided ones might be a problem. So I bought one that wasn't lidded but the front entry area was low so I had litter all over the place. This one is perfect. No litter outside the box; cat seems to like it as she uses it. Maybe after she loses weight I will buy a lidded one, but it seems that I don't need the lid since there's hardly any litter outside this box. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Clutter Hater

customer_reviews.title: Finally a box that works
customer_reviews.text: We have a small kitty, but she likes to pee high on the outside, which always causes smells and a mess. We tried many different varieties, but after reading the reviews on this box we decided to give it a try. It works! It is tall enough for her to back up on but keeps the pee inside the box with no more messes. It's slick at the bottom so easy to clean up too. A bonus for us is that the sands stay in the box pretty much, as she is a kicker.
customer_reviews.author: Travel nerd

customer_reviews.title: I’ve never had anything crack like this before
customer_reviews.text: I would leave this litter box with no stars,but I had to leave it with one. It cracked the first time I picked it up on the corner, unbelievable, I’ve never had anything crack like this before, even cheap stuff doesn’t do that. The plastic seems to be way too hard and molded very thin in spots. Looks good in the picture but the quality is very poor....Mom was right you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: cindy cherry

customer_reviews.title: Works great for our 2-box cat
customer_reviews.text: After years of using a single large box beautifully, our kitty has taken to doing her business at various places on the basement floor. We bought this box as a possible solution and it has worked. She does one thing in this box and her other thing in the old box.....what can I say? She's an older lady now and she wants what she wants. We covered this box with a large cardboard box that a big cooler came in - my husband cut out an entrance for her. So she has the privacy of a covered box and I think appreciates the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: 3rd Box Car

customer_reviews.title: High Sided with Rim: Stops Litter From Going Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I needed an open air litter box for my cat since he was diagnosed with asthma. We originally had CatIt's Large Litter Box, but it was covered and dust would accumulate on the top of the pan's carbon filter and all over the sides. I am very happy with Catit's Litter Pan with Rim because the litter does not stick to the sides of the pan and it is very easy to clean and remove debris. Although my kitty still digs and covers his mess well after using the litter box, the high sides with the rim protector prevent much splashing of the litter from going every where. I highly recommend this for anyone with older kitties or kittens.
customer_reviews.author: FelineFriendly

customer_reviews.title: Nice and high sided. Like it, so will you!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this box as a deterrent to litter flying up and out of the box, for our 4 month old kitten. She had no trouble getting into it, and it helps hold down the litter rain when she’s flinging it all over to cover her stuff. I’m sure it will continue to work for her as she gets older as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Curved bottom is difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Highly curved bottom edges make it difficult to scrape wet litter from box. Longer box makes it difficult to fit into space that I have available. I can't find a litter mat long enough to catch the litter from their paws. It should come with an adjustable or trimmable mat that can be at least 30 inches long to catch the litter that the cats drag out of the box. I would like another mat also, for the enclosed box that sits next to it. Catit could sell adjustable mats seperately and I would buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Ross DeSautel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for big cats
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The inward facing brim blocks almost all litter from escaping when my big cats dig before doing their business. Without a brim, litter goes everywhere. Now, the litter outside the box is what their feet carry with them when they get out. The biggest of the boys sometimes hung it over the old box’s edge for a deuce. This one is big enough for him. At the worst, it winds up on the wide brim. Big box for big boys. And the stupid dog doesn’t go digging for “doggy treats.” (Dogs are disgusting that way.....)
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Not great for girl cat who pees standing up
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like it - it's nice and big, a raised back end, etc. However, our female cat doesn't squat when she pees so we'd sometimes get pee out the front or she would pee on the plastic rim and it would seep out and under the litter box. Instead, we are going to make our own from a 13-17 gallon sterlite tub and try that. For most cats this would probably be great, just not ours.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Johanning

customer_reviews.title: its was taped together
customer_reviews.text: I got this today and the top piece was taped to the bottom piece. It seems like that would be no big deal except you have to remove that tape and its sticky residue before you use the box. Ended up scrubbing off the tape and scratching the brand new box.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Lichliter

customer_reviews.title: The perfect litter box!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 kittens were kicking litter everywhere. This isn't too big for them to get in and out of and solved my problem!!
customer_reviews.author: spinns

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the litter inside.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th litter box I’ve purchased for our 1 1/2 year old cat. She is an avid litter kicker and this box contains her mess. It’s large enough for her to do her business in the box instead of outside. I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Walker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome litter box!
customer_reviews.text: My silly cat was unknowingly (to me at least) peeing on the wall behind her previous litter box because the sides were so low and making a big mess of things. This litter box has sturdy, high sides and she has not been able to get the wall thus far. This makes me very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: TERRIFIC Litter Pan
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I bought this litter pan: my cat was a foster and the foster mom warned that the cat wouldn’t always crouch so she sprayed outside the box. No problem with this high-sided beauty! Edging snaps on/off for easy emptying and whatever it’s coated with, the litter just slides out. I highly recommend this litter pan, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ronan11

customer_reviews.title: Best amazon purchase ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, It’s ginormous ! Unless your furry friend is life size I don’t see any big future lifter messes :) Its built perfect to work with a liner because the top snaps over it securing it in place. I always used to have to clean up the random times he left poop on the side of the bin or on the floor but there have been no accidents with the. My kitten ( 8 months and 8 lbs) didn’t even care I changed his litter box, as soon as I put it together he just hopped in, did his business, and went about his busy day.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 😊
customer_reviews.text: I have a two year old cat & recently got a young kitten. Between the two of them, I've swept & vacuumed more litter off the floor than there ever was in the actual pan. After shopping around for months, I came across this is pan. It arrived yesterday & let me just say, I've never been more pleased. 😁 It's actually bigger than I expected, both cats have lots of space, there's been no more kicking the litter everywhere, & the walls are nice & high while the entrance is still accessible. The pan is also super sturdy. 10/10 Would Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dallasss

customer_reviews.title: Not bad- but could be better
customer_reviews.text: This is a big box. Massive. Has pretty high walls, so it helps prevent SOME litter from spreading. Not all. My issue with it is, the lip that dips down on one end can allow space for a cat to pee outside of the box. Happens all the time if you use more than maybe 2 inches of litter in the pan. It's avoidable, but a major pain if you use just a bit too much litter. Otherwise, solid box overall.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Good design.
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is a big (16 lb), lazy, long-haired, pampered house cat, who is getting old (16 years). I was tired of vacuuming up the litter she kicked out of the box, so I ordered this one with high sides. I wondered if she would fit inside. She has plenty of room and she has no problem jumping into it and keeping her urine in the litter, not on the sides of the pan. Another plus with this pan is that it has a lip on the front that holds the plastic bag while you clean the litter. Good work Catit.
customer_reviews.author: Homebody

customer_reviews.title: The Search Continues
customer_reviews.text: This box has good size and a nice snapping rim feature, but also substantially flimsier construction than a pureness brand box I was replacing. I use liners so I don't move my litter boxes much, but I would bet jostling this one filled with litter would invariably break it. I use the johnny cat heavy duty litter box liners because they're the sturdiest I've found (I have scratchy cats). The jumbo size fits TERRIBLY in this box and no matter how I initially position them, I end up with the liner pocketing at both ends. The little pockets act like smaller litter boxes inside the larger litter box and get overly urine saturated after a couple uses.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Out of 3 litter boxes...
customer_reviews.text: This one is by far the best. I have a four-month-old kitten who loves throwing litter outside her box. I've bought three boxes...the rim on this one keeps the litter inside the box. Thank God...I was getting tired of vacuuming every day. :)
customer_reviews.author: Angela N

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This did not help with the litter kickers. Still ended up everywhere. Then, after 6 months of use it's already cracked. Having to order a different pan tonight. The only good thing was that it was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hall

customer_reviews.title: Just needs to be bigger
customer_reviews.text: The design is quite good - it does seem to keep more of the litter inside the pan where it belongs. The height is great - most litter pans don't work for the "high pee-ers" out there but the overall dimensions, as with almost all litter pans, fall short. There are a lot of big cats out there. I would have given this five stars if it was just longer and wider.
customer_reviews.author: Farm wife

customer_reviews.title: Cat Never Got to Use It
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with 5 inch crack on side wall. Packing tape left residue on walls and top piece. Plastic seems very thin. Wish my cat could have used it as the design and high walls seem great.
customer_reviews.author: XetaPrime

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the best litter pan out there!
customer_reviews.text: I love this litter pan and believe me I have tried many others. My cats have a bad habit of scratching the sides of the pan and when you use a liner this can be a problem. I had tried large rubber bands to hold the liner in place to no avail. Then I purchased this pan which has a removable rim that securely holds the liner in place and it is wonderful!! I love the design with the deeper back and the lower front (I have a cat that is 19+ years old and it is easier for him to get in with the lower front. I use Johnny Cat drawstring liners with this and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kagan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size & color!
customer_reviews.text: We have three cats & they love the new litter box! About the same size as the former one it replaced so we were definitely happy with its large size. The lip trim is perfect for the kickers which helps minimize the amount of litter kicked onto the floor. Love the taupe color, the box looks nice and modern. Recommend for larger cats.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouss

customer_reviews.title: BEST LITTERBOX EVER !
customer_reviews.text: Tired of your cat digging to the center of the Earth while kicking out all of the litter? Then you have to buy this litter box!! It's very sturdy and does the job right. My cat loves to clean and dig inside her litterbox, but with the high walls the litter doesn't exit the box! It's very easy for her to enter and exit the litterbox, and there's plenty of room inside for her. Highly recommend product!!
customer_reviews.author: Maja

customer_reviews.title: I love the rim that keeps them from kicking out the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box a year ago as a third box for my two cats and it didn't get much use until I took in 3 stray kittens who are now 7 months old. This became their box in the room where they stay at night and while I'm working. Sadly it developed a large crack after just 4 months of use. I noticed a few other reviews that said theirs cracked after a very short time. I love the rim that keeps them from kicking out the litter. Wish it were sturdier. I have it duct taped and I'm on the hunt for a better option.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ledo

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality product; made from very thin plastic. The plastic on the rim is even thinner than the rest of the body and cracked when the rim flexed. Very poor quality and not even worth the low price.
customer_reviews.author: shadowphoto

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box
customer_reviews.text: I previously used top-entry litter boxes, and the cats had occasional bouts of urinating outside of the boxes. A vet recommended I get an open litter box, and this one does a decent job of preventing litter from getting everywhere due to decently high sides and a lip around the edge. It's also not too bad looking for a litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Meet your Match, Cat!
customer_reviews.text: The stubborn male cat has met his match! My little guy intentionally aims for the wall behind the box every time. One evening the power in the entire apartment went out and the next day the electrician commented, "I can't seem to figure out why the entire system blew right behind the outlet on the wall (pointing near the wall with the litter box. I kept silent. Darn cat! But worth a laugh. Well I searched and found this solution and this box works and keeps things where they need to be kept. He loves the new box too! All is well and well lit.
customer_reviews.author: David Patrick Faustina

customer_reviews.title: Its Very large, came in huge box
customer_reviews.text: Awkward to clean, takes up a lot of space- check dimensions! I wanted to return it but it came via USPS and would have cost me $45. to return mail. I donated it.
customer_reviews.author: Katy B.

customer_reviews.title: very helpful in controlling "throw-over"
customer_reviews.text: Really makes the litter area more tidy! My cat used to throw litter EVERYWHERE while he was digging in the box. NO MORE! If your cat won't use an enclosed litter box, this is the next best thing. The "lip" comes off easily when you need to dump the litter out. Reattaches easily too. Note, it's a pretty big litter box so you may need extra litter. Works well for my large cat.
customer_reviews.author: amyi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have found larger litter pans with easier entrance at Menards. The entry is very high, unsuitable for kittens or elderly cats. There is a rim around edge with an extension that protrudes into pan. Elderly cat with ailing vision and stiffness cannot judge how to execute entrance& exit and hits legs, either tripping up the hind legs or catching front.
customer_reviews.author: AlleyCat

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my 4 mo. old from kicking litter everywhere.  Highly reccomend this roomy litter box for any size kitten or cat.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old kitten was scattering litter everywhere, as far as 2 to 3 feet when she kicked back, but this litter box has stopped it. She has no problem getting in and out and jumped right in to use it after I put it down. The box is very roomy and I'm certain it will continue to stop her from scattering even as she grows. Definitely recommend this for anyone who has a kitten or cat who likes to kick and scatter the litter with force. Works so well I bought another one as her 2nd litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be sorry for purchasing this litter box! It’s purrfect
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best litter box I ever bought! I’m living with family members at this time and have to keep the box in my bedroom. Vacuuming was pretty much a daily chore. Thi box keeps the littercontained! And my two cats took to it almost immediately! I highly recommend! And the soiled litter doesn’t stick to the bottom of the pan!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy F.

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to get one that would keep litter in the pan. the back of this is higher and tapers down to the front. It has the rolled sides and I think it helps to keep litter from being flung over the back but it doesn't help with problem of litter on the floor from the feet of my cat. Not sure what I could really do about that. Pan is sturdy and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Good size and shape, material is too thin.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from Amazon warehouse as "Used- like new, delivered in original packing". It arrived with a damaged area in the front. I didn't want to return so I kept it. The first time I changed the litter i noticed the very thin side had a crack in it. The shape is nice, the box is large, the cat likes it. The rim helps. It is just cheaply made. Please see attached photos.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Super-sized litter box!
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought this a long time ago. We have two cats, and sometimes aren't as diligent as we should be with cleaning out the litter. We also routinely go on weekend camping trips. This giant litter box is great if you have multiple cats or can't get to the litter as often as you should.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon and MelisaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: It Stops the Mess!
customer_reviews.text: I have a young foster cat who has the worst litter-kicking problem I have ever encountered! She's leery about using an entirely covered litterbox because she wants to be able to see everything all the time, so this box was an attempt at a compromise. Even with the lip in the front, this box has reduced the spread of litter by about 85%, and when paired with a litter mat, I don't even have to vacuum every day anymore! Really nice design, I think I've found my new go-to box.
customer_reviews.author: Electra

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pan if your issue is a cat that aims ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan if your issue is a cat that aims high when he pees, but my issues were my cats constantly kick litter over the sides, and jump over the sides when they are done instead of walking out the front (and onto the litter mat!) This box isn't high enough to prevent them from jumping over the sides and I think it's because the front is barely lower than the sides, so the cats think, "whatever!" and jump anyway. Positives for this box is it is sturdy, nicely shaped, and large. Isn't exactly what I wanted, but can't fault them for it. It's a good box.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: I need more!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a box my long cat can use comfortably! And my small boned cat doesn't fling litter everywhere when he's cleaning up after himself! Does tip a little bit if they step on the edges, so I mixed regular scoopable litter with my light weight. I've preordered a second one and suggest this box to anyone with a bug boned long cat!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box for a large cat
customer_reviews.text: My large cat has no problems doing his business in this box. Plenty of room for him to cover it up and what not. It's also easy to clean as the lip around the top edge pops off so you can empty it out. But that lip, when on, cuts down significantly the amount of litter that use to get kicked on to the floor. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good litter pan for cats that like to toss litter around.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats who tend to fling the litter around rather than just cover their waste. The rim on this litter pan prevents almost all the litter from winding up on the bathroom floor. It's also pretty big (my cats are 15 and 17 pounds) and they have no problem turning around when they use it. I really like this litter pan. It is the best one I've found so far. The covered litter pans are OK, but my cats don't like them, so I had to find one that wasn't enclosed but would also catch all or most of the litter they fling around. This litter pan does that. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ConstantReader

customer_reviews.title: Really helps keep kitty area cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is great. The rim helps keep litter in the box when my cats are using it. Nothing negative about the box, but wanted to say the rim makes the area the cats get in smaller than the dimensions. A few of my cats are very big boned and chunky so they don’t use this one as much as my average size cats. I have two of these and one extra large litter box without a rim.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent litter box.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted new, better litter boxes to replace my old ones. The Catit Cat Litter Pan with Rim was perfect. It is much deeper than the shallow litter box it replaced, and litter no longer gets all over the floor. I use it along with thick jumbo sized liners. The cover snaps in place over the liner keeping everything neat and clean. I originally purchased only one to see how it works, and now I'm ordering a 2nd to replace both my litter boxes. My cats and I are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, poor quality plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design. I actually got it because it seemed like the Nature's Miracle disposable litter box might fit perfectly inside the litter box, as a liner. Unfortunately, the litter box arrived terribly damaged, cracked at the bottom. I have asked for a replacement, which I hope arrives soon...because again, I do like the size. However, I can see that it is made of thin, brittle, poor quality plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I Am

customer_reviews.title: The Rim Wasn’t Effective But Liked Everything Else
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats that LOVE to kick litter out of the box, which is why this box seemed like a good option for them since it has the curved edge. I can’t do top entry boxes or ones with lids as my cats get paranoid about the enclosed space. This box is a good size and the rim keeps the pan liner in place. But unfortunately the curved rim was no match for my girls, and so the litter kicking olympics continues 😒
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: no problems with the pan...
customer_reviews.text: ...just with my cat. she is still somehow able to get litter outside of the pan, but it is considerably less than with other pans, so it's still a win. it's a nice spacious pan and it fits inside my cabinet well.
customer_reviews.author: kichi

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why “scent” is listed for part of the review. I bought this one because if all the great reviews...then returned it. There was litter EVERYWHERE. I have never had a cat, but I figured the high sides would keep most in the box. I was tired of constantly cleaning up.
customer_reviews.author: keeks62

customer_reviews.title: litter pan
customer_reviews.text: it is tilted down on one end which still causes an issue with the litter getting outside of the pan. I had to place a book under the pan due to the pan tipping and all the liter is kicked out.. so now it is even and the litter stays inside the litter pan for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Comello

customer_reviews.title: No more cat litter on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I love this litter box. No more litter all over the floor. Litter stays inside litter box no matter how much cat digs in it. My cats didn't want to use it the first day because it is a little different then the old one. So I had to put them in it. They used it after a few times of putting them in it. I like it being deep. I can put more cat litter in it.
customer_reviews.author: Pandalynn

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made Litter Box. Don't Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Update... Oct 20,2020, The side panels of the litter box have cracked!! The sides of the litterbox are very thin!! I now have duct tape holding the side together. If they had invested pennies more they could of made a sturdy reliable product. The design is well thought out. Unfortunately, they cut corners on the product just to save a few cents!! Don't bother buying this litterbox it will not last a year!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe (Claremont,CA.)

customer_reviews.title: Well built box for large cats
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this box for almost 3 years and I am planning to purchase another one. I have 6 cats, and 2 are 18 pounds. None of my current cats have any problems in getting in or out. My 20 year old cat did, but I purchased a litter box just for her as she stayed in a small area of the house. This box has taken a lot of abuse over the years and has held up very well! I highly recommend it for large or active cats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Johnny-Cat liners!
customer_reviews.text: This cat box solves two cat-box problems: the sides are high, and the rim extends over the edge, so cats can't kick the litter out onto the floor. And, unlike many other high-sided boxes, Johnny Cat Heavy-Duty liners fit over this one perfectly. Once the liner is on, you can snap the rim back on, so it stays put. When it's time to change the litter, just remove the rim and lift the liner out. Great design, great price, messy cats thwarted. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: CHANGED MY LIFE - BUY NOW
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: changed to one-star. These boxes have both CRACKED. I’m leaving my original review because this is a great product if you can afford to replace every month. Best litter box. Can’t believe it took twelve years to find it! ❤️ Keeps messes away! I have two now for my 2 old cats. So much less litter to sweep away, this sucker contains it all and my two old wildebeests love peeing and pooping here!
customer_reviews.author: amy m

customer_reviews.title: Very nice box
customer_reviews.text: Really nice litter pan and it is HUGE. I love that it has a lip and that it is slightly slanted so nothing gets kicked out of it. It also comes with an odor neutralizer, which was a nice little "freebie". When my kittens get older they will need two, so I plan on getting one more when they are older. So far all of the Catit products I have purchased are absolutely amazing and worth every penny. I can't wait to buy more from them.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. BlackTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Me and my cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my cats. It's nice and large with high walls and a very snug, removable cover. It makes it difficult for my cats to flick cat litter and spray over. Rounded corners which make it easy to scoop. The gray color makes the litter box blend into the background. My cats love it!
customer_reviews.author: ColinCr8mgs

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a litter box in a hurry and wasn't fussy about what style. This turned up in my search results and didn't cost too much, so I was happy to give it a try. It turns out to be one of the best litterboxes I've used. The high sides keep the litter in even if the cat is an enthusiastic digger, and the separable rim adds an extra barrier against litter scatter and helps secure a liner in place. The slight angle down toward the front makes the box accessible despite the high sides. When I needed a second litterbox recently, I unhesitatingly purchased this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Verre

customer_reviews.title: no messes over the side
customer_reviews.text: it's a little bigger than I expected, but that was a good thing, my rather large cat always managed to go over the side of my other litter pan, and throw litter everywhere. This pan keeps things where they belong, now there's no litter and cat poop on my bathroom floor, yea!
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Reduces litter spreading, should be bigger
customer_reviews.text: Could be bigger -- an extra 3 inches long would be better - but it keeps the litter in better than a standard litterbox.
customer_reviews.author: JenJen

customer_reviews.title: My favorite litter box
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like this litter box when it comes to keeping litter in the litter box. Highly recommend. Keeps ur floor clean. Yeah :)
customer_reviews.author: K Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Litter Box. The previous one we had was much smaller, didn't hold as much litter and I found my kitty spending ages trying to cover up after she'd used the box. The very first time she used this box, she was in, did her business, covered up one time and she was out. I was delighted. No more listening to her scooping and scooping and scooping. There's just more room for her to move around, there's room for more litter, it's just a perfect litter box. Absolutely delighted with this purchase. Happy cat, happy owner.
customer_reviews.author: Michelegg

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t keep litter in
customer_reviews.text: Actually had more litter outside this box than my old one. Was really hoping it would help solve my problem but very disappointed. Since it was used for 2 days I don’t think I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra bradley

customer_reviews.title: But it doesn't do a great job of keeping litter in the pan
customer_reviews.text: It does what I hoped it would, which is to keep the cats from peeing OUTSIDE of the litter box. But it doesn't do a great job of keeping litter in the pan, and it's made too flimsily. The top collar is okay--it doesn't need to be particularly strong. But the lip on the bottom part is too thin. When I go to pick up the front of the pan to drop it on the floor to knock wet litter loose, I can't really grip most of it. That lip needs to be more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: skareht

customer_reviews.title: Litterbox
customer_reviews.text: This is where my kitties go poo and pee. I am obligated to clean their feces and urine from it on a daily basis. Unfortunately they continue to do this because I give them food and water. It's a vicious cycle I fear I may be bound to for the entirety of my existence on this rock we call earth. I have tried feeding them less but find they become aggresive and I am forced to submit to their desires. I pray for your souls. It will never end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great litter box, except for one thing. It arrives with the two pieces (rim and box) taped together with some extremely sticky tape! I tried using a commercial glue remover that removed some of it. The problem is that litter box sand adheres to the residue and is impossible to scrape off. I wrote to company's customer service asking for advice, and didn't bet an answer. Otherwise I like the high sides and cat seems happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Phi Ver

customer_reviews.title: I judge this the best as the litter does not stick to the bottom. Easy scooping !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan nearly 2 years ago. It’s holding up great, no cracks. I have two litter pans. What’s so wonderful about this one is the litter does not stick to the bottom ...it’s almost like it has a greased surface ( which of course it does not !) The scoop literally glides under it. My other expensive litter box tends to stick. I have to really work to get that scoop in to pick up the clumps. I am ordering another one of these and getting rid of that box that sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary Mary

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver *UPDATE*
customer_reviews.text: This pan has greatly reduced the amount of litter I have to clean up after my princess handles her business. An added bonus, the edges/lips seems to push her bottom more towards the middle of the box, so everything is in the litter instead of sometimes running down the inner sides... Making clean up a breeze! 10/25/2016 Update So while I loved the design, the plastic is, sadly, cheap and brittle. I picked it up to change the litter this evening and heard two pops. I then saw two cracks running down either side of the box that originated from the holes that the rim clips to. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jared H.

customer_reviews.title: RIM HELPS ALOT
customer_reviews.text: The RIM helps keep litter in the box. It has stopped my cat from doing things that are stuck to the wall and I had to scrape off. Front entry point is a little LOW and litter is getting out there. Easy to clean - which is a big help! If all four sides were higher it would help.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Good idea small design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of the litter pan. The tall sides and raised back are great! The issue I have with the design is the way the ring clicks into the base. I don’t like the little tabs that are hard to line up with the holes. I can see these breaking off in a very short time.
customer_reviews.author: Big R

customer_reviews.title: Great design.
customer_reviews.text: Have the removable frame around the top of this tray was a game changer. I was able to secure a garbage bag with the frame so the cats couldn’t fool with it. I also liked how deep this tray was. The cats couldn’t throw the litter out of the tray and the depth of the tray and the frame kept it all contained. In sum, this is a great design.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bultman

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Does a really good job of reducing the amount of litter kicked out. My cats are furious diggers, and this has really helped on the amount of litter outside the box. The lip where they get in can allow for some to get out, but it still sticks out a little in the box, so most is contained. It's also a really nice size. I've had 2 of my cats squeeze in together when they are impatient to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that is a tad chunky.... His big butt fits perfectly in this box. He hasnt peed or pooped over the side of it yet and weve had it for a little while. He likes this box so much that he stopped using the other box in the house. I might buy another one so he switches it up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F

customer_reviews.title: Good Litter Pan
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this litter pan. I haven't used the rim yet. The pan had a strong smell even after I scrubbed it with detergent and warm water. One cat used it but the other wouldn't. After it sat outside for a couple of days the odor was gone and now both cats use it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Preuth

customer_reviews.title: Tall enough for a non-squatter  :)
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! Thrilled with this purchase! We found out our stray, Finley, was peeing over the litter box so we had to replace our mudroom floor. We switched out the taller litter box to a shorter one for Her Majesty Hermione, who is almost 16 years old...who promptly peed over that one also! Great! I found this litter box on Amazon and received it yesterday. Happy! Happy! Happy! Her Majesty used it and it was tall enough so she did not miss. I would recommend this to anyone and as an earlier review stated "This should be the gold standard for litter boxes!" I could not agree more.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rene' Puetz

customer_reviews.title: litter sticks to it
customer_reviews.text: The box is nice and high so litter doesn't fly out. The plastic finish on it isn't very slick so when the cat digs to the bottom to pee, those clumps stick like glue to the bottom or sides. The cheap boxes that I got at dollar store stick less than this one.
customer_reviews.author: snyder

customer_reviews.title: Plastic seems thin
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good size. The plastic is really flimsy and thin I feel like it can crack at anytime my 15 lb cat steps on the edge /entry. I will update to give an idea how long this will last. I bought this for its size and style.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny N.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding litter box - don't pay more for other options!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this litter box! I used to have a shorter litter box and constantly had litter spread throughout the room. This box has reduced litter outside the box by 90% or more. The price is also great - I've seen some 2X and 3X more expensive, I have absolutely no idea how they could be worth it. If you are not planning on putting the box in another piece of furniture (i.e. cat house), then this is the best option for a cat litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul V.

customer_reviews.title: Sticky tape residue
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer taped together the top and bottom of the litter box in four spots with long pieces of industrial tape. While trying mightily to take off the tape, it ripped unevenly, making it impossible to remove. In the places where I could peel it off, it left sticky residue which gathers kitty litter. I will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Page

customer_reviews.title: Big size but kitten still flung out litter often
customer_reviews.text: It's a very large size but my kitten (5 mos old now) still would fling out litter mulitple times a day. The big reason why I bought it was the walls were very tall. I was so bummed that my cat still flung out litter.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat!!
customer_reviews.text: This just came today. My cat is thrilled! He's a digger and the generic boxes we've tried were just did not have high enough sides to handle the flinging litter. I was a little nervous seeing the reviews showing the broken plastic but after receiving it, the thickness is that of a normal litter box. If you are a stickler on color, I will admit that the pan is slightly darker than it shows in the picture which is no big deal to me. I would recommend this box to others!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: Litter stays in box
customer_reviews.text: Likes: the fact that the cat can’t kick the litter out of the box was really a plus. This is a smart design and I wish all litter box manufacturers had thought of this. Now you just have to make different sizes
customer_reviews.author: Karen Horsekeeper

product_meta.title: Catit Cat Litter Pan, Gray, 58702
product_meta.description: The Catit Cat Litter Cat Pan with Litter shield Rim is a cat litter enclosure designed with a deep base design, high sides and raised back to keep litter inside the cat litter tray for easy clean-up and less mess. The built-in cat bag anchor helps keeps the cat litter bags open making it easier to use a cat litter scoop. The cat litter box large is ideal for multi-cat households. Pair this item with the Catit Cat Litter Mats, Catit Cat Litter Scoops, Cat Litter Deodorizers and Cat Litter Liners to have a complete set of Catit litter cat supplies (all sold separately). This xl cat litter box is suitable for all types of litter including but not limited to crystal cat litter, clumping cat litter, lightweight cat litter and unscented cat litter. As you might know, cats can be picky! While some cats prefer covered cat litter boxes others prefer an open lid cat pan. Catit offers a wide variety of products including cat litter boxes that are perfect for your picky kitty! Catit is focused on creating cat enrichment toys for all cats especially indoor cats. Cat toys for indoor cats should encourage a cat’s natural foraging and hunting behaviors. Catit offers a wide variety of products including cat toys, cat treats, cat food, cat trees, cat food dry, wet cat food, cat bowls, cat accessories and other cat supplies.
feature_bullets: Quality and performance driven products for your pet
Provide a better quality of living for your pet with Catit

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
